text.div:
DefinitionStatus

Codes identifying the lifecycle stage of a definition.

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/definition-status defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
draft DraftThe definition is in the design stage and is not yet considered to be "ready for use".
active ActiveThe definition is considered ready for use.
withdrawn WithdrawnThe definition should no longer be used.
unknown UnknownThe authoring/source system does not know which of the status values currently applies for this resource. Note: This concept is not to be used for "other" - one of the listed statuses is presumed to apply, but the authoring/source system does not know which.

name: DefinitionStatus
title: DefinitionStatus
description: Codes identifying the lifecycle stage of a definition.

concept.definition: The definition is in the design stage and is not yet considered to be "ready for use".
The definition is considered ready for use.
The definition should no longer be used.

The authoring/source system does not know which of the status values currently applies for this resource.  Note: This concept is not to be used for "other" - one of the listed statuses is presumed to apply,  but the authoring/source system does not know which.
